verbs.description: The most significant result of the summit [V: may] be President Trump ’s new confidence that he uniquely understands the North Korean leader .
[ARG1: The most significant result of the summit] [ARGM-MOD: may] [V: be] [ARG2: President Trump ’s new confidence that he uniquely understands the North Korean leader] .
The most significant result of the summit may be President Trump ’s new confidence that [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MNR: uniquely] [V: understands] [ARG1: the North Korean leader] .
